name: Mountain Pong
description:
Remastered classic pong game with mountain theme. Desained for 2 player.

How to play
Use paddel to bouce the ball to opponent field. If ball touch the corner of opponent field, the player gain 1 score. Player with 5 scone win the game.

Control
Player 1 : Use "W" for up "S" for down
Player 2 : Use "up botton" for up "down button" for down
